analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0xd9555279b1c18b7aa388f053ebc0ab22e2497964.sol:
	Contract ReactioonToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xd9555279b1c18b7aa388f053ebc0ab22e2497964.sol#234-235)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0xd9555279b1c18b7aa388f053ebc0ab22e2497964.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0xd9555279b1c18b7aa388f053ebc0ab22e2497964.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/8/0xd9555279b1c18b7aa388f053ebc0ab22e2497964.sol#98) is not in mixedCase
